## Dataset Info:
Dataset has 31 columns and 198 records<p/>
**columns:**<p/>
1. country/region
2. unit (MtCO2e: metric tons of Carbon Dioxide)
3. Years: 1990 to 2018

**website:** **CLIMATEWATCH** <p/>
link: https://www.climatewatchdata.org/ghg-emissions?end_year=2018&gases=co2&start_year=1990
